title: Did the Mayor of San Juan sabotage relief efforts in Puerto Rico to make President Donald Trump look bad?
subtitle: A woman claiming to be a police officer in Puerto Rico indicated that federal relief was not distributed after Hurricane Maria in order to inflict political damage on the Republicans.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A Puerto Rican police officer had revealed that the Mayor of San Juan was sabotaging relief efforts in order to adversely affect President Donald Trump.
